thread.title: Tear gas reported in Paris as students protest alleged rape of detainee by police (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Tear gas reported in Paris as students protest alleged rape of detainee by police (VIDEO)

author: RT
title: Tear gas reported in Paris as students protest alleged rape of detainee by police (VIDEO)
text:
Tear gas reported in Paris as students protest alleged rape of detainee by police (VIDEO)   11:07 Edited time: 23 Feb, 2017 11:21 Get short URL ¬© Ruptly Police have deployed tear gas during protests against police brutality in Paris, French media and Ruptly reported. Residents, mostly students, have taken to the streets of French capital to denounce the alleged rape of a black man by police. 
WATCH LIVE: Anti-police brutality protests hit Paris 
Hundreds of students have taken to the streets for the demonstration, LCI TV reports . 
Up to 16 high schools in Paris were totally blocked by protesters, while 12 others were partially blocked. The protest is trending under the hashtag #BLOCUSPOURTH√âO (Bloc for Theo). 
Tear gas was reportedly deployed in Place de La Nation in the heart of the French capital, a regular venue for protests. 
Among the schools blocked Thursday morning were Dorian Claude Bernard and Maurice Ravel lyc√©es, LCI said. 
The demonstration was called by Independent Counter-Struggle Movement (MILI) on Facebook. 
‚Äú The climate in France is becoming more and more worrying. A great mobilization of youth is more than necessary to counter the security and racist climate ,‚Äù the group said .
